articles.author: Stephen Puddicombe
articles.title: Tour de France stage 1 Live - Race for the first yellow jersey begins in Florence - Cyclingnews
articles.description: 206km from Florence to Rimini will test the major contenders from the outset
articles.content:
2024-06-29T15:14:03.317ZWilco Kelderman is now taking it up for Visma-Lease a Bike. Might they go in for the kill, and try to eliminate Juan Ayuso from GC contention?
